name: Meatloaf Caprese Sandwich
description: Prep the meatloaf ahead of time to get this recipe ready in 10 min! Microwave or bake, chill, then slice.

ingredients.name: medium-sized panini buns or chopped baguette

preparation:
1. In 4-Cup Prep Bowl, stir sauce mix with water and let stand 5 min. Meanwhile, cut each slice of cheese in half. To bowl, add olive oil. Whisk vigorously. Add cheese; gently toss to coat.
  2. Slice buns open. Toast, if desired.
  3. Fill each bun with meatloaf and cheese. Drizzle with any remaining pesto sauce.
tips:
Bocconcini are small mozzarella cheese balls. They come in different sizes and are delicious in salads. For this recipe, look for pre-sliced bocconcini (sometimes called medallion slices).

For a warm sandwich, simply microwave prepared sandwich until warmed through. Alternatively, warm sliced meatloaf in a pan on the stovetop.
